snippet.title: Parallel (2022) - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam right now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1388350/Parallel/

Finally Parallel is ready. For 2 years and 10 months I dedicated myself exclusively to the development of this game. With a lot of faith in the work and in the gamer community, I committed to bringing a good game to everyone. Even knowing my limitations, I always tried to do my best and face any obstacles that could get in the way of the mission.

In Parallel, the player explores a new planet full of mysteries and adventures, with beautiful landscapes and moments of tension and action, where your choices can change the story of the game. All this is presented by a red clown who accompanies the player in this adventure.

Thank you to everyone who follows me or helped me in some way. Thanks also to God and the family, without their support, this project would not be possible either. May you all believe very strongly in your goals and succeed.
